original_title: Three Sinha Group honoured with Gold for Best Inquiries Management System at INCO 2023
original_body_lines: Three Sinha Group of Companies Managing Director Manjula Ariyakumara receiving the Gold Award

Three Sinha Group of Companies, a leading player in Sri Lanka’s construction sector, has been awarded the Gold Award for Best Inquiries Management System at the INCO Premiere Industrial Exhibition 2023.

The event organised by the Institution of Incorporated Engineers Sri Lanka, took place at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) and attracted participants from across the country.

Starting small, The Three Sinha Group of Companies has grown to become a leader in a highly competitive industry through dedication and hard work. The company has been consistently recognised with numerous awards, including gold and silver awards at the CNCI Achiever Awards ceremony, gold award at the Sri Lankan Entrepreneur of the Year awards ceremony and Best Product Awards at the Sri Lanka Institute of Architects Awards ceremony.

Offering a wide range of products, the company specialises in roller doors, roller shutters, sectional overhead doors, window shutters, fire-resistant doors, aluminium fabrications, sensor doors, stainless steel pantry cupboards, automatic barriers and motorised sliding and swing gates.

Three Sinha On-Grid and Off-Grid environmentally friendly solar systems, which come with a 37-year warranty, have gained significant popularity among the people of Sri Lanka. IKLO Industries, a subsidiary of the Three Sinha Group of Companies, has recently entered the agricultural equipment production market and introduced a series of tractor trailers specifically designed for agricultural purposes. The company also manufactures diesel tanks adhering to the standards of Ceypetco and IOC to meet the requirements of various factories. The company is also a primary supplier of diesel tanks to both Ceypetco and IOC. Furthermore, IKLO utilises the latest technology to construct high quality pre-fabricated and pre-engineered steel buildings.
